greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of multiset partitions of weight n whose union is a k-set where each part has a different size.
comment: Each element of the k-set must be represented in the multiset partition.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1325 (rows 0..50)
program: R(n, k)={Vec(prod(j=1, n, 1 + binomial(k+j-1, j)*x^j + O(x*x^n)))}
M(n)={my(v=vector(n+1, k, R(n, k-1)~)); Mat(vector(n+1, k, k--; sum(i=0, k, (-1)^(k-i)*binomial(k, i)*v[1+i])))}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Feb 08 2020
